page.title: 11HEALTH CARE ON RHUM
page.content:
The doctor comes to visit Rhum once a month if the weather allows. He comes from Eigg. He will only stay for one night and in that time he sees everyone on the island. If anyone's ill and the doctor isn't on Rhum to attend to them he is phoned up for advice. If the illness is minor then the doctor prescribes medicine stored in the Chief Warden's office. If it is very serious then a helicopter is sent to take the patient to hospital in Inverness. After any births a district nurse, based in Mallaig, may also call.
The dentist comes from Fort William twice a year. The castle has an equipped dental surgery. Patients are checked in the castle. Any treatment required is given if possible.
